meanings.definition: A person who has had long experience in a particular field or activity.
meanings.sent1: The veteran chef knew all the best recipes by heart.
meanings.sent2: The veteran teacher shared valuable insights with the new staff.
meanings.sent3: The veteran gardener could make flowers bloom even in winter.
meanings.sent4: She was a veteran in the art of negotiation, always coming out on top.
meanings.sent5: The veteran firefighter's bravery inspired the whole team.

meanings.definition: An old soldier who has seen long service.
meanings.sent1: The veteran proudly displayed his medals from past battles.
meanings.sent2: The veteran saluted the flag during the military parade.
meanings.sent3: The veteran soldier joked about having fought in the 'ancient wars'.
meanings.sent4: His eyes held the wisdom of a veteran who had seen it all.
meanings.sent5: The veteran's uniform bore the marks of countless campaigns.
